title: #255: Examining Race and Police Conflicts with Douglas Flowe, Part 1
description:
Jim Clemente and Lisa Zambetti welcome Douglas Flowe to the podcast. The Washington University professor and author of several books including Uncontrolable Blackness looks at the historical context of racism in American police departments from the 19th century through the death of George Floyd.

#HisNameWasGeorgeFloyd

#BlackLivesMatter

Purchase the books written by Douglas Flowe

https://www.amazon.com/s?k=douglas+flowe&crid=3DOKO0J5BRYNZ&sprefix=douglas+flo%2Caps%2C317&ref=nb_sb_ss_i_1_11
